Texts.Eng: Defense Systems

Texts.Chs: 治疗蒸气
Texts.Eng: Healing Vapors

Texts.Eng: Hydrogen Batteries

Texts.Eng: Improved Solar Cells

Texts.Eng: Isotope Processing

Texts.Eng: Item Utilities

Texts.Eng: Laboratory Centrifuging

Texts.Eng: Peerless Producers

Texts.Eng: Peerless Solar Cells

Texts.Chs: 电力筛选
Texts.Eng: Powered Sifting

Texts.Chs: 动力冶炼
Texts.Eng: Powered Smelting

Texts.Eng: Protocite Batteries

Texts.Chs: 量子核子学
Texts.Eng: Quantum Nucleonics

Texts.Chs: 量子处理
Texts.Eng: Quantum Processing

Texts.Chs: 硅电池
Texts.Eng: Silicon Batteries

Texts.Chs: 蒸汽动力
Texts.Eng: Steam Power

Texts.Chs: 亚空间通信
Texts.Eng: Subspace Communications

Texts.Chs: 科技配线
Texts.Eng: Technical Wiring

Texts.Chs: 全面净化
Texts.Eng: Total Purification

Texts.Chs: 风力涡轮机
Texts.Eng: Wind Turbines

Texts.Chs:
^orange;1级^reset;

你已经自学了一些基本的电学，现在可以在你的^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;处制作各种基本的连线机械。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 1^reset;

You've taught yourself some basic electronics and can now make a variety of rudimentary wired machinery at the ^orange;Electronics Center.^reset;

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

随着你对太阳能技术的理解，恒星的自由能量现在已经触手可及。你现在可以在你的^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;处制造太阳能电池板。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

The free energy of stars is now within your reach with your understanding of solar technology. You can now build solar panels at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

使用物品网络，你可以自动化大量的工序，并显著改善你的生活质量。研究实用物品，之后你可以在^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;处制造关于物品网络的实用物品。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Using Item Networks, you can automate a huge number of processes and improve your quality of life dramatically. Researching Item Utilities will give you access to a laundry list of useful utility objects at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

使用硅，你已经学会了在你的^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;制造简单的固态电池 - 这和旧的铅酸电池相比有了很大的进步。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

Using silicon, you've learned to create simple solid-state batteries at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;- a big step up from junky old lead-acid ones.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你现在可以用钨制造一台大而笨重的离心机，更有效地处理液体，也可以安装外部附件以生产罐蜂蜜。请在你的^orange;电子设备制造机^reset;处建一个。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

With Tungsten, you can now build a big, bulky centrifuge that more efficiently processes liquids and can also receive external attachments to jar honey. Build one at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经设计了一个装置，当提供电能时，它能把大气压缩成液体。产生的液体取决于行星。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've designed a device that will condense the atmosphere into liquid when powered. What liquid is produced depends on the planet.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经改进了你的化石燃料燃烧机的设计。用内燃机，你可以用更广泛燃料的产生更多的电能。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've improved upon your fossil-fuel-burner design. With a Combustion Engine, you can generate more power than an Alternator using a wider array of fuel types.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经学会了将铜制泵和挖掘器升级到铁制的版本，这样工作起来更快。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to upgrade your copper pumps and quarries into iron versions, which work more quickly.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经学会了使用电产生的热能来自动熔化材料。^orange;电炉^reset;只能处理^gray;普通^reset;和^green;非凡^reset;矿物，但是其能从从矿石和石块中获得额外的材料。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've learned to use electrically-generated heat to smelt materials automatically. The ^orange;Electric Furnace^reset; can only process ^gray;common^reset; and ^green;uncommon^reset; ores, but it's great for getting extra materials from ores and blocks.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;2级^reset;

你已经掌握了蒸汽动力这门原始的实用艺术。你可以制造一台液压活塞，使用“热”燃料，如熔岩或星核碎片来产生早期的电力。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 2^reset;

You've mastered the primitive-but-useful art of steam power. You can build a hydraulic piston that boils water using 'hot' fuels like lava or core fragments to generate early power.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

对耐热合金的实验让你可以制造一台强大的电弧冶炼炉，更有效地冶炼至多4级的矿石。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Experimentation with heat-resistant alloys have lead to your creation of a powerful Blast Furnace which can efficiently smelt ^cyan;rare^reset; ores, and many materials which regular furnaces can't handle.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你在你的筛分机设计上有了改进，你现在可以更有效地收获蕴含在方块种的大量宝藏了。你也可以制造一台碎岩机，破碎比沙子和淤泥坚硬的材料，如鹅卵石和砾岩。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Having improved upon your Sifter design, you can now harvest the hidden treasures of blocks much more efficiently. You can also create a Rock Crusher, which breaks up hard materials like cobblestone and conglomerate instead of sands and silts.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

混合液体收益颇丰。特别是现在你设计了一台机器来干这件事。液体混合器不仅可以快速而清洁地产生液体反应，而且可以进行一些手动混合液体时无法进行的反应。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

Mixing liquids can have many beneficial effects, especially now that you designed a machine to do just that. The liquid mixer can not only produce liquid reactions quickly and cleanly, but also allows for some reactions that couldn't happen when mixing liquid manually.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

随着获得更耐用的金属，如钛，你已经开发了一种风力涡轮机，其能在合适的环境下持久地产生大量的可再生能源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

With access to hardier metals like Titanium, you've developed a durable wind turbine which will generate lots of renewable energy in the right environment.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你设计了一张工作台，用来创建逻辑门，传感器，陷阱和其他大规模的电路部件。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've designed a crafting table for creating logic gates, sensors, traps and other large-scale wiring objects.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经开发了一台圆润的新离心机，感谢原体材料的力量，新的离心机工作效率更高。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've developed a sleek new centrifuge that is better at its job than before thanks to the power of Protocite processing.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经掌握了核裂变的窍门，现在可以建造核裂变反应堆，它不仅提供成吨的能量，还能产生有用的核裂变副产品。不过请小心辐射。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've gotten a hang of nuclear fission, and can now build Fission Reactors that not only provide tons of power, but also generate useful fission by-products. Just mind the radiation.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经改进了你的冷凝器设计，制造了一台更有效的设备，这台设备除了凝结液体，还会凝结许多有用的反应剂和元素。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved upon your condenser design to create a much more potent device which will condense many useful reagants and elements in addition to liquids.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经提高了用硅制造电池的技能，现在可以制造出比以前能储存更多能量的电池。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've improved your skills building batteries with silicon, and can now create batteries that hold much more charge than before.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了将你的铁制泵和挖掘机升级到钛制版本，这样工作起来更快。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to upgrade your iron pumps and quarries into titanium versions, which work more quickly still.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;3级^reset;

你已经学会了用石墨烯来增强你的太阳能电池板，使你能够制造更大更高效的太阳能电池阵列。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 3^reset;

You've learned to use graphene to enhance your solar panels, allowing you to build bigger and more efficient solar arrays.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

通过将纳米纤维和寂灭金属结合，你可以创造出不可思议的强大的太阳能塔，收获大量的可再生能源。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

By combining nanofibre and Quietus metals, you can create incredibly potent solar towers which harvest vast amounts of renewable energy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

使用原体矿令人惊异的储存和输送能量的能力，你设计了一种新型电池，其在各个方面都晚完爆硅电池。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Using Protocite's amazing ability to store and channel energy, you've designed a new kind of battery that is better than silicon in every way.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

使用高级的金属和机械，你已经创建了一个自动制造机，配置后可以在提供合适材料的前提下快速制造任何物件或物品。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Using advanced metals and machinery, you've created an automatic manufacturer which can be configured to quickly craft any item or object you want when provided with materials.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

利用你的大气力学知识，你已经设计了一个过滤空气和调节温度的装置，隔绝附近的各种危险。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

Using your knowledge of atmospheric mechanics, you've designed a device which filters the air and regulates temperature, providing protection against many hazards while nearby.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

使用了人工智能技术，你设计的离心机是如此高效和强力，它甚至可以将放射性同位素处理成令人兴奋的新形式。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

With AI technology, you've designed a centrifuge that is so efficient and capable that it can even process radioactive isotopes into exciting new forms.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经学会了将你的钛制泵挖掘器升级到超致密版本，现在它们工作起来非常快。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've learned to upgrade your titanium pumps and quarries into Densinium versions, which work extremely quickly.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

你已经把你连线的专业知识投入工作，现在你可以制造许多用于防御或自动化的自动炮塔。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 4^reset;

You've put your wiring expertise to work, and can now create many autonomous turrets for defense or automation.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;4级^reset;

通过将你的医学知识应用到电学，你制造出了一台能够快速治愈很大范围内的一切的力场发生器。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

By applying your knowledge of medicine to electronics, you've created a field generator that rapidly heals everything within a wide radius.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

结合量子技术和寂灭金属，你开发出了一种奇特的电池，它能像生物一样储存能量，拥有更快的储能和放电速度。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Combining Quantum technology and Quietus metals, you have developed a bizarre sort of battery that stores energy almost like a living creature. This comes with even better storage capacity.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

星际互联网是一个繁忙而有利可图的地方，现在你可以用你新设计的机器来访问它。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

The interstellar ansible internet is a bustling and lucrative place to be, and now you can access it with your newly devised machine.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;5级^reset;

为啥要在能进行更多应用的时候止步于基础聚变呢？虽然昂贵，但^orange;大型聚变反应堆^reset;利用氢同位素产生的能量非常值价格。不过它仍然^red;需要诸如水或液氮的冷却液^reset;。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 5^reset;

Why stop at -basic- fusion when you can create something far more appealing? While expensive, the ^orange;Large Fusion Reactor^reset; is well worth its weight for the power it can produce using hydrogen isotopes. It still ^red;requires coolant such as water or liquid nitrogen^reset;.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

将量子力学用在发电上是很少有人做到的事情，但说你现在也是其中的凤毛麟角，你设计的新型量子反应堆。它既能燃烧传统燃料，也能燃烧深奥燃料，产生难以想象的巨大能量。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Generating electricity from quantum mechanics is something very few people have done, but you can count yourself among them with your new Quantum Reactor. Capable of burning both traditional and esoteric fuels, it generates unfathomably large amounts of power.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

液态金属氢是一种非常强大的能量媒介，它能让任何固态电池黯然失色。有了它，你就能设计出全宇宙最好的电池。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Liquid Metallic Hydrogen is such a potent energy medium that it blows any solid-state battery out of the water. With it, you've designed what may well be the best battery in the galaxy.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

不满足于传统的萃取设备，你用量子力学的知识改进了的设计。量子萃取器不仅比以往工作得更快，而且从提取中产生的能量是以往的两倍。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Not satisfied with traditional extraction machines, you've improved on the design with quantum mechanics. Quantum Extractors not only work faster than ever, but produce twice as much from their extractions.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

使用你新发现的量子知识，你已经设计了一个难以置信的强大的电弧炉，它比高炉熔炼得更快更有效率，同时也可以通过将其内容物加压到超过气态巨行星的压力水平来执行量子转换。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

Using your newfound quantum knowledge, you've designed an incredibly powerful electric furnace that smelts even more efficiently and quickly than a blast furnace, but can also perform quantum conversions by pressurizing its contents to levels that surpass gas giants.

Texts.Chs:
^orange;6级^reset;

你已经掌握了大气净化技术。有了大气调节器，没有什么地方你不能安顿下来 - 如果你愿意的话甚至可以裸奔。
Texts.Eng:
^orange;Tier 6^reset;

You've mastered atmospheric cleansing. With the Atmospheric Regulator, there is no place you can't settle - butt-naked, if you so choose.
